name: Kurohyo 2: Ryu Ga Gotoku Ashura-hen
description:
he second popular series presented by "Ryu ga Gotoku Studio" is now available on PSP®!

A year has passed since then... He was looking for his future. And for himself.
The man who was once called; "The Mad Dragon of the Kamuro" ...Tatsuya Ukyo.
The man that wandered around the land of America and held his future in the palm of his hand should have been happy...
However, the emptiness that rushes in leads him back to his hometown of Kamurocho, Tokyo.
The boys he met there. Those who lived on the edge as he once had.
The encounter makes him realize what he's about to lose.
Tatsuya was sent back to that place. To the underground fighting ground; "Dragon Heat", a place where one should never return.
However, what was waiting there was Osaka's strongest martial arts group "Ashura" aiming to conquer Tokyo!
And the battle with Ashura has begun.
Mysterious incidents begin to occur one after another in Tokyo and Osaka. The plot that unfolds beyond it threatens to sweep away Tatsuya and all of the boys!
What is the answer Tatsuya and the boys found in the battle?
Fight if you live! If you fight, seize control of life!

There is an answer...in battle!
